title: Daycare Pay At Booking Pricing
pricingIntro: Enter daycare pricing by number of dogs (up to 10).
helperTextOne: Daycare rate charged when 1 dog is booked.
helperTextMany: Daycare rate charged when {count} dogs are booked together.
addonDescription: Optional grooming services that can be added during daycare booking.
noticeEnterOnePrice: Please enter at least one valid price.
